title: Interpretation of seeing someone mocking you in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone mocking you in a dream. Online page. Visionroy2a.com. Dreaming about someone mocking you in a dream indicates anxiety, fear, new jobs and projects, and the fear of those around him of blame and reprimand. A husband’s mockery of his wife indicates the outbreak of disputes between them, and we will explain that. That in this article is the interpretation of a dream about someone mocking you in a dream, the man, the unmarried young man, the unmarried woman, as well as the married woman, or the pain of some imams such as Imam Ibn. Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other artists of the modern era, so follow us on the Roya website. What is Imam Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about someone mocking you? Seeing ridicule in a dream means that you are entering a new stage, which may be in study, work, or the emotional side, and fear From accusing those around you and blaming them. The dream of some people mocking the major and finding someone to defend him in a dream indicates that a close person will cooperate with him and return injustice to him, and this person could be the father, mother, or wife. Other related dreams: Interpretation of a vision Finding paper money and receiving it in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream that someone mocks you in a single woman’s dream? Seeing someone looking sarcastically at an unmarried woman in a dream indicates new changes in her life, such as joining a new job. If a girl sees that she is responding to someone who is looking at her sarcastically And you answer him forcefully, as this indicates victory and victory over enemies and getting what you want. What is the interpretation of a dream that someone mocks you in a dream about a married woman? If a married woman sees that someone is mocking her, this indicates her fear of accusation and warning from those around her. Sarcasm indicates in The dream indicates fears and psychological problems. If a married woman sees that her husband is mocking her, this indicates a lack of understanding between them and many accusations and warnings from the husband. Other related dreams: Interpretation of seeing someone turning his back to me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that someone mocks you in a dream about A pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman being mocked indicates fear and anxiety about childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees someone defending her from those mocking her, this indicates that she has lost fatigue and pain, and that she has gone through difficult stages. What is the interpretation of a dream about someone mocking you in a dream about A divorced woman? Seeing sarcasm in a dream indicates that there are people in her life who cause her troubles and troubles. If a divorced woman sees that she is being insulted by someone who mocks her, this means that she has obtained her stolen rights and has triumphed over her enemies. Other related dreams: Interpretation of a dream about eating with someone Do you love them? Is the interpretation of a dream about someone making fun of me for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees that someone is making fun of her and ridiculing her, this indicates that person’s desire to get close to the girl and communicate with her. Seeing a husband making fun of his wife in a dream means many disagreements and problems between them. What is the interpretation of disdain in a dream? Seeing a woman disdain in a dream indicates the blessings that God has bestowed on that person and opening the doors of livelihood and kindness. title: Interpretation of my teeth falling out in a dream - I see teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out: The upper part of a tooth falling out in a dream. Teeth falling out in a dream. Ibn Sirin. Front teeth falling out in a dream. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream for a pregnant woman - Teeth falling out in a dream. Whoever dreams that his teeth are falling out shows bad things to some of his friends. And if he sees all his teeth falling out in his hand or in his property The descendants of the people of that house multiply and their number decreases, and the tooth falls out if it is not treated while it is. He takes it in his hand or bites it off of his clothes. If it is blood, then this is a sin for severing ties of kinship, unless he owes a debt, in which case he demands it and is healed from it. If he pulls out any of his teeth that have fallen out, he may make a mistake and regret it and hide it, and the debtor may be liable according to the amount of the blood money in the Shara, tooth loss may be referred to. For those who struggle with hardship, fasting is necessary. A tooth falling out in a dream can indicate some important points that were explained by the most famous interpreters, and he confirmed that seeing teeth falling out in a dream could mean a lack of money, psychological imbalance and anxiety, and molars. In a dream it could mean that they are the elders of the family and those responsible for it, and it may also mean that it is the home of the man or the children. As for women, the teeth in the lower row of the mouth may symbolize their adaptation to the female, and the greater decrease in vision indicates men and may indicate cutting The womb is given by a person to his relatives around him, and it may indicate this. Paying off the debt in some cases and indicating that the person does not have any problems with the people around him. A tooth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a tooth falling out in a dream indicates a long life for the pioneer. In the case of seeing all teeth falling out at the same time, it may indicate This leads to the death of all family members before him. And whoever sees that all his teeth have fallen out in his hand, it may indicate abundant sustenance and the acquisition of money. And whoever sees teeth falling on the dreamer’s lap, it may mean that the dreamer will be blessed with a child, and if he sees them falling to the ground, it may mean the death of someone. Relatives of that person. Basically, losing a tooth or molar in a dream can mean suffering from depression, anxiety, problems, sadness, and many pains and also shows the end of religion, each of which depends on the person’s condition and closeness to God Almighty. The appearance of tooth decay in a dream Broken teeth can indicate in The dream indicates stress and illness. If you see a decaying tooth falling out, this may indicate the loss of any value. It may be the loss of a job, the loss of a project, or a large amount of money. When a man sees a tooth that is rotten from the inside or damaged, this may mean that he is afflicted with many diseases. If you see a decayed tooth being repaired, this may mean that a person can regain the sparkle in his life. Tooth decay can indicate problems that a person has suffered from in the past. And when the dreamer sees that he is repairing the wear and tear of a tooth in a dream, this may indicate that he He fulfills his desires and dreams that he wants to achieve. The appearance of a tooth in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that her tooth may fall out, this may mean that she will give birth to a boy and that

title: Visiting the house of the dead in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of visiting the house of the dead in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she enters the house of the deceased and she remembers him. It shows that she will enter into great anxiety in her life and will grieve for him a lot. And if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is visiting the house of the dead in a dream and she is very happy. A sign. That she will take the wrong path in her life, and it will make him very sad. What if the unmarried girl is forced to enter the house of the dead without anyone knowing about her dream. The meaning indicates that she will make a wrong decision without referring to an elderly person in her life. The unmarried dreamer who sees that she is visiting The house of the deceased in a dream, and he knows him well. An indication that she will suffer from anxiety and severe distress in her life now, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of visiting the house of the dead in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is visiting the house of the deceased in a dream Next to her house. This indicates that she will encounter a big problem in her life during this period of time, and God knows best. A married woman sees the dead person’s house and misses him, so she visits him in a dream and is happy. This indicates that he will face a lot of trouble during this period and will not overcome it easily. And a married woman In a dream, she is forced to enter the house of the dead person while crying over him. This is a clear indication in the dream that he will live a happy life after extreme fatigue, and God knows best. And if a married woman sees in a dream the house of the dead person and visits him with her husband, it indicates the end of the problems that her husband is going through in life with him. This period of time. Interpretation of the vision of visiting the house of the deceased in a dream for the divorced woman. If the divorced woman sees in a dream that the deceased lives next to her and visits his house after his death. This indicates that she is sad and crowded at this time and will mourn for her. And the divorced woman who dreams that she visits the house of the dead with her ex-husband. A sign. However, she will return to her ex-husband after a long period of disagreements and problems. And if the divorced woman looks at the house of the dead in her dream and wants to enter it. Here the meaning appears that she will fall into a big problem in her life during this time, and God knows best. And the divorced woman who visits the house of the dead, and he was pure and beautiful in the dream , he will be happy. It indicates that he will get rid of a difficult issue that he was going through, God willing, at this time. Interpretation of the dream of visiting the house of the deceased for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is visiting the house of the deceased in the dream and he is happy. Here is a report on getting rid of a difficult and heavy situation that this dreamer had He passes by it. And the dreamer knows that the house he entered was the residence of the dead person in the dream. This is an indication of the great compensation that he will see after losing something important in his life, God willing. And if the dreamer sees in the dream the house of the dead person clean and beautiful. This is an indication that this dreamer will do many things for this. The deceased. And seeing that the dreamer was visiting the dead in a dream and was happy about that. He declares that he will do good things in his life during this period, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love and crying over him. The meaning of seeing the dead person’s house in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If the pregnant woman dreams that she is visiting the house of the deceased.

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about distributing meat according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about distributing meatInterpreters see that the dream seems good and carries a lot of news for the dreamer, but it portends bad news in some cases, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing the distribution of meat to single, married and pregnant women according to Ibn Sirin and senior scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about distributing meat according to Ibn SirinWhat is the interpretation of a dream about distributing meat? Distributing meat in a dream is evidence of an abundance of sustenance and blessings in health and money, and it symbolizes that the dreamer will have many children in the future and God (Glory be to Him) will bless him with righteous offspring. If the dreamer sees himself distributing meat to the poor and needy, the dream indicates that he will get a promotion at work and that his financial income will improve significantly in the coming days. If the dreamer sees himself distributing raw meat in a dream, this indicates a feeling of helplessness and frustration due to his failure to achieve his ambitions and goals, and the vision also indicates the presence of problems in his professional life that may be on him. He was fired from work and went through a financial crisis that he will not get out of until after a long time. Seeing the distribution of forbidden meat portends bad news, as it indicates the separation of a family member, either because of his distance from him or his approaching death, so the dreamer must pay attention to his loved ones and take care of them during this period. What is the interpretation of a dream about distributing meat according to Ibn Sirin? Distributing meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin means longevity and continued health and well-being. If the dreamer sees himself cooking meat and then distributing it to the poor and needy, this means that God Almighty will bless him in his life and protect him from sadness and worry. If the dreamer is sick and sees himself distributing cooked meat to people, the dream symbolizes his imminent recovery and freedom from diseases and problems. If the dreamer sees himself distributing spoiled meat in his dream, this means that one of his family members will be in danger or suffer from health problems, so he must be careful. Egyptian website The largest website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world Just type Egyptian dream interpretation website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about distributing meat to single women Seeing the distribution of raw meat symbolizes that the unmarried woman is going through a bad psychological state due to the many concerns that she is carrying on her shoulders at the present time, and the dream urges her to be patient and strong so that she can get out. From this crisis. The dream indicates the girl's feeling of helplessness, despair, and loss of confidence in people due to a psychological shock from her previous romantic relationship, and the vision is a warning to abandon these negative feelings, forget the past, and pay attention to her future. If she was cooking meat before distributing it in her dream, this indicates her relief from her anxiety and the removal of worries from her shoulders, and it also indicates that she will soon hear good news about her family. If the dreamer is living a love story in the current period and sees herself cutting meat before dividing it in a dream, this means that she may be harmed by her partner, so she must be careful about him. Interpretation of a dream about distributing

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twin goats

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a goat giving birth to twins in a dream for one girl: When an unmarried girl sees a goat giving birth in her dream, this means that she will receive happy news full of goodness, God willing. Seeing a girl slaughtering a goat in a dream means a short marriage date, God willing. When an unmarried girl carries goats for a girl When an unmarried woman sees herself serving her food, this indicates that she will achieve the things she wants to achieve, God willing. When an unmarried woman sees that she is folding food, this indicates that she will find relief from God Almighty until the anxiety that exhausted her heart ends. A herd of goats in a dream for an unmarried girl. Married is a sign of the dreams that she wants and the desires that she will have. Also, seeing a herd of goats in a dream is a good sign that her husband is in the future. He will have a prominent position and a very prosperous man, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. See also: Dreaming about the birth of a goat. Interpretation of witnessing the birth of twin goats In a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a goat in a dream, this may indicate that she will become pregnant and give birth to twins, for God’s knowledge. Also, a small goat for a married woman indicates that she will give birth to many children, by God’s command. Seeing a goat in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will give birth almost. And God knows best. In the case of a woman who has never given birth before and sees a goat in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to twins, God willing. Cooking goat meat is just a good sign of the abundance of livelihood that this woman will obtain, as well as abundant money. Giving birth to a goat in a dream For a married woman, it indicates that she will hear the news of her pregnancy during the next period of menstruation or childbirth, God knows best. Perhaps the good news for a married woman with a pregnancy and twins is before God. Slaughtering a goat for a married woman is a sign of the disappearance of what she owes, as well as the end of her life, God willing. Goats in a dream for a married woman A good sign of pregnancy if she really desires it, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a goat giving birth to twins in a dream for a man and its meaning. When a man dreams that a goat is giving birth, this means that he will have many children and give birth to twins. A goat entering a man’s house in a dream is only a sign that he will get A lot of kindness. Many goats in a dream, good news for this person portends the success of his business that brings profit. Perhaps it will be good news for him for the upcoming promotion, through which he will obtain a distinguished position. The birth of a goat in a dream for a man, brings him good news of the arrival of news It makes the heart happy to hear. If he sees him giving birth at home, this warns the man that he will get into trouble, quarrel with his wife, and perhaps the matter will reach his children, and God knows best. When chasing a black goat, it warns the person of the people around him who have a grudge against him. They look at him with envy to fortify themselves with the legal vision. If a man slaughters this black goat, this heralds him that he will triumph over the enemies, God willing. In the event that a man sees a goat giving birth in the mountain, especially on the top of the mountain, the good news for him in the place he will take is He really wishes from Q

When a man dreams that a goat is giving birth, this means that he will have many children and give birth to twins. A goat entering a man’s house in a dream is only a sign that he will get A lot of kindness. Many goats in a dream, good news for this person portends the success of his business that brings profit. Perhaps it will be good news for him for the upcoming promotion, through which he will obtain a distinguished position. The birth of a goat in a dream for a man, brings him good news of the arrival of news It makes the heart happy to hear. If he sees him giving birth at home, this warns the man that he will get into trouble, quarrel with his wife, and perhaps the matter will reach his children, and God knows best. When chasing a black goat, it warns the person of the people around him who have a grudge against him. They look at him with envy to fortify themselves with the legal vision. If a man slaughters this black goat, this heralds him that he will triumph over the enemies, God willing. In the event that a man sees a goat giving birth in the mountain, especially on the top of the mountain, the good news for him in the place he will take is He really wishes from Q

title: Interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream and killing him.. A gecko in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Seeing a gecko in a dream and killing it, or a gecko in a dream, is one of the visions that many people experience during their sleep, and it is one of the unwanted visions because it is often evidence of evil. There are many interpretations that have appeared about seeing a gecko in a dream, and this is according to a large group of scholars. Dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi, and through this article in the encyclopedia we will learn about the interpretation of dreams. Seeing a gecko in a dream, and we will also learn about the interpretation of killing the stomach in a dream. Seeing a gecko in a dream and killing itThe gecko, as a rule, is a type of repulsive insect, which is harmful to humans, and therefore it is undesirable in life, and therefore seeing it in a dream is also undesirable. Desirable and undesirable, and seeing a gecko in a dream differs in interpretation terms, depending on the type of vision that the person has, as well as the person’s condition, and hence many interpretations of seeing a gecko in a dream and also seeing its death in a dream have emerged. Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream in the event that you see the cavity inside The house in a dream, this vision shows that there is a dirty person inside the house, and he is one of the people who seeks evil, and is forbidden from doing good or doing that. Also, seeing a stomach in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy for that person, and it appears in the dream in the form of this muzzle, If you see it in the house, this indicates the presence of an enemy. From his family or from his family, and God knows best. Also, seeing a gecko in a dream and blowing on the fortuneteller, in this case, the interpretation of this vision is that the person will get sick, and blowing the stomach on the person is a vision of evil and shows that the person is upset. And afflicted. Seeing a gecko or a gecko in a dream spewing out some of the money belonging to the fortuneteller, this vision indicates that this person will become poor and lose his money in the near future and is evidence of misfortunes and evils. Seeing a gecko in a dream indicates the presence of evil near the dreamer, whether it is a person Hypocritical, spiteful, or envious, especially if he is seen at home or near the dreamer in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream Seeing a gecko in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will be affected by magic or touch, and is evidence of evil or harm to that dreamer, whether male or female. The leprosy that comes out of the dreamer’s mouth in a dream indicates that he will be cured if he is sick and his distress will be relieved if he is worried. But if the stomach comes out of the dreamer’s vagina in the dream, this means that he will give birth to a son with bad morals and he will be a reason for the sadness of the family. If one sees In his dream that he is cooking a large lizard, his vision indicates that he will not achieve the goals he seeks. But if he roasts lepers in a dream, this means that he has committed great sins and disobedience, and will be punished in this world and the hereafter. What does leprosy mean in a dream? Says dream interpreter Muhammad bin Shirin Leprosy in a dream symbolizes the presence of a person close to the dreamer who is following the path of desires. One of the dreams that portends a dream is that there is a distribution on the wall of the dreamer’s room, and this dream shows that there is a person near

title: Interpretation of a dream about a monkey

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a monkey in a dream and its meaning, as many people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is considered a positive or negative connotation, and you may also be interested in knowing the uncle in a dream. Blessings and he has become less resourceful and has nothing to do in life, because the monkey in general is considered a disgusting animal, so you can find out more important details about this topic through our article. A monkey in a dream for a girl shows that someone wants to get close to her and she must Be careful with him. The appearance of a monkey in a dream mentions the narrator’s unhappiness and his inability to settle down. The monkey in the narrator’s dream indicates an enemy that he and himself must pay attention to. The appearance of a monkey in a dream is a type of monkey. It indicates the presence of evil and one must be careful not to fall into it, God forbid. Interpretation Monkey in a dream and its meaning. Learn about the interpretation of the monkey in a dream and its meaning, as there are different indicators and signs for this dream that differ from one person to another, but seeing a monkey in a dream indicates the presence of a person who is poor in money and religion and he has nothing. It indicates a malicious person, a hypocrite, or a thief. But if you see a monkey attacking a human being in a dream, but he manages to overcome him, this indicates that he will contract a disease, but he will recover. From this. Moreover, seeing a monkey in a dream is an indication that this man has many faults and does some bad and wrong actions, but if you see a male monkey in a dream, this indicates the presence of a deceitful, cunning, and corrupt man. This indicates the presence of a corrupt and witching lady, as many scholars say that whoever sees a monkey in his dream symbolizes deceit and deception of the people around him. You may also be interested in knowing: Maghrib prayer in a dream Interpretation of a monkey a woman saw in a dream Through the following points you can learn about the interpretation A monkey in a dream and its meaning, as it has many different connotations and connotations that differ from one person to another: When a woman sees a monkey in her dream, this is a sign of a cunning man who longs for her. In addition, seeing a large number of monkeys in a woman’s dream indicates adulterers In her environment and society. As for an unmarried girl who sees a monkey in her dream, this indicates the presence of an unreliable person and she should beware of him. A woman who sees that she is eating raw monkey meat in a dream is taken as an indication that she is eating from what comes into her breast, and whoever sees that she is eating monkey meat Grilled or cooked, this indicates poverty and dire need. A woman who sees in a dream that her husband or fiancé has turned into a monkey, this symbolizes that he is a deceitful and cunning man. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a donkey in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a monkey in a dream. Many want to know the interpretation of seeing a monkey for a man in a dream, as scholars and jurists say in Interpretation of dreams: There are different and multiple connotations for this dream. As for whoever sees that he is eating monkey meat in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from anxiety and severe anxiety. In addition, whoever dreams of a monkey constantly chasing him, this is a bad sign, as it is a warning of illness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting nails by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting nailsIt is worth noting that Ibn Sirin states that the interpretation of a dream about cutting nails indicates the dreamer’s victory over everyone who has evil and hates his success, but the interpretation varies from one person to another and according to the entire interpretation of the dream. Cutting nails in a dream, what does it signify? Learn about the interpretation of a dream about cutting nails through the Mukhtalion website, which offers everything new and exclusive. Seeing nails being trimmed in a dream means that the dreamer is going through a difficult period full of problems and financial difficulties. As for an unmarried girl’s dream of cutting her nails in In a dream, this indicates that she will get rid of those who hate her and hold evil and hatred for her. It was also said that trimming the nails of an unmarried girl means getting closer to God Almighty and repenting to God for the sins he commits. In addition to trimming the nails easily and quickly in a dream, it is to distance yourself from Sins and disobedience and to repent for any sin you have committed. In addition, a married woman’s dream that she cuts her nails and decorates them with a manicure is a sign to start receiving good news and joyful news. After all, cutting nails in a debtor’s dream is a sign of the approaching date of paying his debts and getting rid of His fears about thinking about him. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about embracing the dead and its relationship to the death of grief. Interpretation of cutting nails in a dream by Al-Osaimi. The honorable Sheikh Al-Osaimi said that the interpretation of a dream about cutting nails in a dream for a widowed woman is to begin entering a new married life in which she will be happy. But if this woman is divorced, The dream of cutting nails in her dream indicates that the period of problems with her husband has ended and that he will return to his purity in the near future. On the other hand, when a woman saw that she was wearing colored acrylic nails in her dream, she was a hypocritical woman who wanted to take something without her right. Also, cutting nails In a dream for a single girl, it is a sign that this girl has good morals and a good reputation. If the nails that this girl cut are dirty and unclean, this indicates the end of the period of problems and worries in this girl’s life. Whereas if a girl cuts herself while cutting her nails in a dream This vision is evidence that she will be associated with a person who is not suitable for her. In addition to someone trying to cut this girl’s nails, this is evidence that this person intends to harm this girl and is approaching her for some benefit. Trimming nails in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman cutting her nails In her dream, it indicates that she is a good woman with good behavior and a fragrant life. Also, the dream interpretation of cutting nails is evidence that the dreamer’s financial situation will improve and that he will be able to pay all his debts. If a married woman sees that her husband is cutting her nails and wants to do so, this is evidence To settle her life with her husband and that they will become closer to God. In addition, seeing a married woman joyfully cutting her nails was a sign of joy, happiness, and freedom from worry and sadness. In addition, seeing long, white, beautiful nails in a dream is a sign of gaining prestige and high status. how much

title: Interpretation of walking barefoot in a dream

preview.html: Walking barefoot in a dream: The dream of walking barefoot in a dream shows many interpretations that indicate goodness, but the connotations also differ according to the vision of each person being married, pregnant, single, or male, and we explain both. Walking barefoot in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Psychologist offers you different interpretations of walking. Barefoot in a dream according to the translator Ibn Sirin, such as: If a person dreams in his dream that he is walking and barefoot, this is a sign that he will get a lot of food, which he will obtain, God willing. But when a person dreams in a dream that he is walking on one leg and he is barefoot This means that he will face some problems in his marital life and this may lead to divorce. The interpretation of a person’s dream that he is walking barefoot indicates that he will face some crises and difficulties, because his personality is not strong. When the dreamer sees in his dream that he is walking barefoot but he was crying Often, this indicates that he is sorry for something he did because of sins and disobedience and needs God to forgive him. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me food on all occasions. Offered in a dream to Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of people who dream of walking barefoot is mentioned in their dreams, such as: When he dreams In a person’s dream he is walking barefoot, this indicates that his sorrows will end, God willing. If a man sees in his dream that he is walking barefoot, this is a sign of the death of his wife. The interpretation of the dream differs if the person who dreams that he is walking barefoot is born in the country, then this indicates However, his condition will be corrected for the better, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing walking barefoot in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen explained several signs of walking barefoot in a dream, which are: A dream of walking without shoes indicates bad morals, neglect, and sadness. Also, a dream of walking without shoes indicates fear. And that you will face many financial crises and need help. When an unmarried girl sees that she is walking barefoot, this is a sign that she is worried about her future and delaying her marriage. If a married woman dreams that she is walking barefoot in her dream, this means that many problems will arise with her husband. Walking barefoot in a dream There are different signs according to each person’s dream, and we explain each of them: If a person dreams that he is walking without shoes, this means that he will hear good news, God willing. When a person sees that he is walking barefoot and the dreamer in this vision suffers from this walking, this indicates However, he will become in debt. If the dreamer finds that he is walking without shoes and cannot walk, this means that there will be problems and many disputes with his family. The dream of walking without shoes indicates that the dreamer is always thinking about his future, whether it is social, professional, or otherwise. Interpretation A dream about walking barefoot for a married woman. We explain to you the interpretation of walking without shoes for a married woman in her dream, which is: Walking without shoes indicates for a married woman that she will face financial difficulties and fall into debt. But when a married woman dreams that she is walking without shoes and...

title: Interpretation of a dream about wind coming out during prayer by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing wind coming out during prayer in a dream indicates that he is a righteous person and loves to do good and other interpretations that we will explain to the single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, and the divorced woman for the man, such as the passage of wind in the mosque or the mosque, or hearing the sound of wind in prayer, or the wind coming out among the pilgrims for Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, but in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of wind in prayer in a dream Seeing wind coming out in a dream is one of the very beautiful visions, and it is generally ninety percent of the commendable vision, as if one sees wind coming out of him in a dream while he is praying, this indicates his closeness to him. God Almighty, and indicates his great and many charitable works, and indicates that this man does many good deeds. Seeing the exit of wind during prayer in a dream expresses the dreamer's annoyance, boredom and mood disturbance due to some situations he is going through, and although he will not commit sins, he will be responsible for some mistakes in his work and will try to prove his innocence. The person who passes air in his anus during prayer, especially if it does not have a smell, this is a good case, and it indicates the dreamer's surrender to God Almighty and his request for his need with supplication for relief and the removal of worry. Expelling bad wind in a dream expresses pessimism and curse and indicates that he will hear some words that annoy, anger and anger him, and if the smell of the wind is very bad, this means weakness and evil. And the exit of wind during prayer in a dream expresses fear and falling into trouble and exhaustion, and indicates falling into a calamity, and regret after that due to irrational behavior from the dreamer. Whoever dreams that he is praying and a non-evil wind comes out of him in a dream indicates that the owner of the dream asked for a need and prayed to God until it is fulfilled, But this need will be difficult for him and difficult for her to obtain. Spreading the smell of fart in a dream represents taking some wrong steps that cause a lot of discomfort to the person and indicates the corruption of calm due to some situations that one is going through. Seeing yourself kneeling in prayer indicates a person who is swaying behind your back and you will still be forced to confront this person, and this vision also indicates that you must be careful in your words and actions so that you do not say inappropriate words that make you lose your respect. In front of others. It seems in a dream like in prayer a fart came out of him and it is not stinky, then seeing it indicates that there is a matter or desire that he sought or wanted to obtain, but this matter is difficult for him because of what he said of humiliation or humiliation. Daydreams A calamity during prayer in a dream suggests getting rid of problems and the dreamer living in stability and peace of mind. Farting during prayer in a dream indicates that the dreamer will commit some forbidden acts. And Al-Nabulsi mentions that hearing the sound of fart in prayer in a dream indicates that the dreamer must pay attention to his actions and deeds, and the vision is a warning to him not to commit stupidity or actions or words that make him lose those close to him. As you see the dead fart in prayer in a dream, it explains the need of this dead person for prayer and charity. See
